definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Last June, Israel and Hamas agreed to a six-month truce.
sentences.chinese: 去年6月，以色列和哈馬斯同意6個月的停火協議。

sentences.english: And when election day dawns at last, Hamas will still be there.
sentences.chinese: 而當選舉那天終於到來時，哈馬斯仍會留在加沙。

sentences.english: The government has closed the entire border in Rafah and all the roads.
sentences.chinese: 哈馬斯關閉了拉法的整個邊境和所有的公路。

sentences.english: The third was the war to crush the Hamas missile launchers in Gaza.
sentences.chinese: 第三場戰爭是在加沙地區粉碎哈馬斯的導彈襲擊。
哈馬斯是所有人的敵人。

sentences.english: Al-Masri says Hamas' position is obvious.
sentences.chinese: 馬斯里說，哈馬斯的立場非常清楚。

sentences.english: The earth, the text says, is destroyed because of hamas.
sentences.chinese: 書上說，大地是毀於哈馬斯。

sentences.english: There was no martyrdom video of the kind favoured by Hamas.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有哈馬斯喜歡搞的那種殉難視頻。

sentences.english: Israel says Hamas, which will be used to build fortifications.
sentences.chinese: 以色列稱，它們將被哈馬斯用來修築防禦工事。

sentences.english: McClellan said that U.S. policy toward HAMAS has not changed.
sentences.chinese: 麥克萊倫說，美國對哈馬斯的政策沒有變化。

sentences.english: The Israeli military correspondent who accompanied the soldiers said they were concerned about Hamas booby-traps.
sentences.chinese: 以色列戰地記者說他們最擔心的是哈馬斯的陷阱。

sentences.english: It also requires Hamas to stop its policies of confrontation and start becoming a part of the process,” Duguid said.
sentences.chinese: 停火還要求哈馬斯放棄對抗政策，開始參與和平進程。

sentences.english: But the is an all-out war one more timest Hamas and its branches.
sentences.chinese: 這是一場反對哈馬斯及其附屬的全方面戰爭。

sentences.english: Diplomatically, Hamas has cast a wide net.
sentences.chinese: 在外交方面，哈馬斯廣結人脈。

sentences.english: But he said Hamas was not ready to recognize Israel.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他說，哈馬斯還沒有準備承認以色列。

sentences.english: Hamas still holds a tight grip over the Gaza Strip.
sentences.chinese: 哈馬斯仍然牢牢地控制着加沙地帶。

pinyin: Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3

definition: Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3

definition: Netanyahu (name)/Benjamin Netanyahu (1949-), Israeli Likud politician, prime minister 1996-1999 and from 2009
